comment.author: 10657127@N03
comment._content:
This Pictures is backwards needs to be reinserted the houses are supposed to be on the right side of the Picture.  This Picture was probably taken in Barranquitas, Puerto Rico this is the entrance to the old vertedero (Dump) to el Cañon de San Cristobal in Barrio Helechal and sector Usabon. The dump trucks used to drive thru the old tobacco barn all the way to the dump site were the trucks will empty and drop all trash down into el Cañon de San Cristobal a drop of approximately 500 to 800 ft deep.
I was 9 year old when this picture was taken and I remember clearly this place when my family were driving from Barranquitas to Aibonito.

Thank you for the pictures and the memories.
